oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Byron Hill and John Ford Coley - 2006-07-03
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performances by Byron Hill and John Ford Coley from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on July 3, 2006
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Byron Hill; John Ford Coley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Recording begins in progress - Includes questions from the audience. Performances include; Born Country - excerpt (Bryon Hill) -- Nights Are Forever Without You (John Ford Coley) -- Politics, Religion And Her (Byron Hill) -- Should Have Never Left Texas (John Ford Coley) -- Lifestyles Of The Not So Rich And Famous (Byron Hill) -- I'd Really Love To See You Tonight (John Ford Coley) -- Fool Hearted Memory (Byron Hill) -- Who's Lonely Now (John Ford Coley) -- Picking Up Strangers (Byron Hill).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hill, Byron; Coley, John Ford; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
